person.persName: William Oldham (Hopkins Co., farmer and pvt. 2nd Bat. Ky. Cav (csa) and 17th Ky. Cav (usa))

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Elias Oldham and Polly Oldham. Married to Margaret Oldham Oldham in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on May 9, 1861. Student and farmer in Hopkins County in 1850. Day laborer in Hopkins County in 1860. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1863. Served in the 2nd Battalion Kentucky Cavalry (C.S.A.) from October 1861. Served in the 17th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private from February 5, 1865 to April 2, 1865. Reported as deserted from Madisonville, Kentucky, on April 2, 1865.
